name: Sunfire Aegis
tooltip:
Sunfire Aegis

Cost: 3200


UNIQUE Passive - Immolate: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 − 30 (based on level) (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies, increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect adds a stack for 5 seconds, increasing subsequent Immolate damage by 12%, stacking up to 6 times for a 72% increase.

UNIQUE Passive - Flametouch: At maximum stacks, your basic attacks explode around you, burning nearby enemies for your current Immolate damage for 3 seconds.

UNIQUE Passive - Passive: Empowers other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
